column5: Bill Hamblin was a co-writer of the "Musky Hunters Alminac".  He was also a teacher at my highschool for a period of time.  I've always wondered if he was a member of this board.  He was also a guide on Georgian Bay.  Wondering if he still guides.  I'd love to get out with him.  Now that I've moved closer, G-bay is my new playground  Does anyone know Bill?, and what he's up to these days?
Had the opportunity to spend a day in the boat with Bill fishing the Moon, had a blast  I do belive he is still around.
Thanks guys!  Just got a friendly PM with his e-mail address.  I'm gunna see if I can get in touch with him.
Still here...still teaching in Wingham....still Musky fishing.  Hambug
Nick there ya go.  Thats a nice fish there Bill Hamblin .  I,ll bet you just made Nicks day.

Hey Mr. Hamblin!!!  Awsome pic!  Thanks for saying hi!  I was going to fire you an e-mail this weekend, but things got a little crazy.  We had a death in the family.  I don't know if you remember a character named Zane..  He and I talk about you every now and then.  I do a fishing weekend every year with a few guys from F.E. Madill.  Maybe this year we can head out with you for a charter?
I responded to a couple of your posts but they were returned. Please send me your e-mail. [emailÂ protected] Bill
